sen.j: 藤原 家宗（ふじわら の いえむね、弘仁8年（817年） - 元慶元年10月4日 (旧暦)（877年11月16日））は藤原北家藤原濱雄の子。
sen.e: FUJIWARA no Iemune (817-November 16, 877) was a child of FUJIWARA no Hamao from the Northern House of the Fujiwara clan.
FUJIWARA no Iemune (817-November 16, 877) was a child of FUJIWARA no Hamao from the Northern House of the Fujiwara clan.
FUJIWARA no Iemune (817 - November 16, 877) was a child of FUJIWARA no Hamao from the Northern House of the Fujiwara clan.
sen.cmt: スペース補足しました。

sen.e: His mother was from the Okinaga clan.
His mother was from the Okinaga clan.
His mother was from the Okinaga clan.

sen.j: 官位は参議・左大弁、位階は従三位。
sen.e: His official rank was Sangi (councillor) and Sadaiben (major controller of the left), and his Ikai (Court rank) was Jusani (Junior Third Rank).
His official rank was Sangi (councillor) and Sadaiben (major controller of the left), and his Ikai (Court rank) was Jusani (Junior Third Rank).
His official rank was Sangi (councillor) and Sadaiben (major controller of the left), and his Ikai (Court rank) was Jusani (Junior Third Rank).

sen.j: 嵯峨天皇から清和天皇まで五代の天皇に仕えた。
sen.e: He served five emperors for successive generations, namely from Emperor Saga to Emperor Seiwa.
He served five emperors for successive generations, namely from Emperor Saga to Emperor Seiwa.
He served five emperors for successive generations, namely from Emperor Saga to Emperor Seiwa.

sen.j: 伝領地である山城国宇治郡日野 (京都市)（京都府京都市伏見区）に弘仁13年（822年）に法家寺を建立して薬師如来の小像を祀った。
sen.e: In 822 he erected Hoke-ji Temple in Hino, Uji district, Yamashiro Province (Kyoto City) (now, Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Province) and enshrined a small statue of Yakushi Nyorai (the Healing Buddha).

In 822 he erected Hoke-ji Temple in Hino, Uji district, Yamashiro Province (Kyoto City) (now, Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Province) and enshrined a small statue of Yakushi Nyorai (the Healing Buddha).

In 822 he erected Hoke-ji Temple in Hino, Uji district, Yamashiro Province (Kyoto City) (now, Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Province) and enshrined a small statue of Yakushi Nyorai (the Healing Buddha).

sen.j: 天慶元年10月4日に没し、子・藤原弘蔭が跡を継いだ。
sen.e: He died in October 4, 938 and FUJIWARA no Hirokage, his son succeeded him.
He died in October 4, 938 and FUJIWARA no Hirokage, his son succeeded him.
He died in November 16, 877 and FUJIWARA no Hirokage, his son succeeded him.
sen.cmt: 原文は「天慶」となっていますが、938年では生年から考えておかしいのでline4の通り「元慶」が正しいとして訂正しました。

sen.j: 貞観 (日本)13年3月2日（871年）任参議。
sen.e: Sangi (councillor) in March 2, 871.
Sangi (councillor) in March 2, 871.
Sangi (councillor) in March 30, 871.
